code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import authService from"../../../Services/AuthService";import notify from"../../../Services/NotifyService";import"./Logout.css";function Logout(){var navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(function(){authService.logout();notify.success("You are now logged-out");navigate("/home");},[]);return null;}export default Logout;
